last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 430
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lucy considers a career change, after talking to a movie producer. Steve decides to leave ATT and take Cameron with him to the Gold Coast. Terri helps Danny comes to terms with Sam's death. The Simmons family walk off in to the sunset. And Cheree's stalker is right under her nose, as he is revealed in the last scene of the series.

name: Breakers
overview: Breakers is an Australian television series, that was made and aired on Network Ten between 1998 and 1999. It was shown in Ireland on TV3 and City Channel. It was also screened on BBC One in the United Kingdom and TV4 in New Zealand.

episodes.overview: Alex and Monique enter an excitong new phase of their relationship. Cheree flirts with Vince. Hugo agrees to meet his father (Truscott).

episodes.name: Episode 202
episodes.overview: Hugo and truscott talk through their problems. Kate questions Eve about her feelings for Paul. Jack learns devastating news.

episodes.name: Episode 203
episodes.overview: Danny is determined to stop Cheree and Vince's romance. Paul changes his attitude towards Steve. Terri makes a shocking demand of her mother.

episodes.name: Episode 204
episodes.overview: Eve is shocked at how quickly her little girl is growing up.    Anton makes Monique an offer that's too good to refuse. Alex and Monique have their first tiff.

episodes.name: Episode 205
episodes.overview: Monique sells her soul and makes Jaime the offer of a partnership in BMS. Cheree and Vince explore their feelings while hanging Cheree's portrait. Maggie is on top of the world after a night of passion with Geoff.

episodes.overview: Geoff continues to date Maggie and Lucy simultaneously. Paul reveals his true feelings for Eve. Fiona is run ragged by Hugo and her ex-boyfriend, Russ.

episodes.overview: Jack rushes to hospital. Monique is disappointed that Alex is talking his time about whether to move in with her. Fiona and Hugo take a step forward in their relationship.

episodes.overview: Hugo and his dad sort themselves out, but Fiona losses out. Steve's big push to get ATT functioning might get him sacked.

episodes.name: Episode 211
episodes.overview: Terri's plans to have Jack stay over take a turn for the worse. Paul and Eve look to be on the way to reconciling. Boris and Jack finally resolve their differences.

episodes.overview: Maggie continues to deny she has a problem over Geoff's treatment. Steve and Vince strike a deal over the beast. Reuben finds himself in a dangerous situation.

episodes.overview: Jaime gets a nasty surprise. Reuben learns to stand up for himself. Danny starts thinking about dropping out of school.

episodes.name: Episode 215
episodes.overview: Just as Alex agrees to move into the warehouse, when tragedy strikes. Jaime's father replaces the stolen money. Reuben's quest to find Uncle Eddie ends in failure.

episodes.name: Episode 221
episodes.overview: Monique and Alex ride an emotional rollercoaster after Lara's death. Cheree and Erin are getting deeper into the street life. And Dave continues to show concern for Kate.

episodes.name: Episode 222
episodes.overview: Alex and Monique continue their dance of grief. Paul and Eve discover that Danny has been lying to them. Lucy realises Cheree wasn't the theif. Jack and Terri make important decisions about their relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 223
episodes.overview: Paul and Eve learn that Danny wants to leave school. Eve is furious when she discovers Terri and Jack's love nest. Lucy finds herself falling once again for Geoff's charm.

episodes.name: Episode 224
episodes.overview: Fiona fails dismally at her stand-up comedy routine. Jack and Terri are hounded.

episodes.name: Episode 225
episodes.overview: Cheree's wildchild game-playing with Erin leaves them risking physical danger. Lucy takes Geoff back.

episodes.name: Episode 226
episodes.overview: Cheree feels betrayed when Erin caves in and lands her in trouble with the police. Vince is intrigued by a charming stranger (Bruno).

episodes.name: Episode 227
episodes.overview: Eve drags Terri out of potential danger. Cheree's thoughtless actions put her job on the line. Kate has a twinkle in her eye for an attractive newcomer.

episodes.name: Episode 228
episodes.overview: Danny is sprung red handed. Terri sticks to her guns. Vince and Bruno bond.

episodes.name: Episode 229
episodes.overview: Fiona's best intentions backfire on her. Alex takes the wrong approach with Monique. Is Lucy heading for another bad relationship?

episodes.name: Episode 230
episodes.overview: Monique stresses out and decides it's over between her and Alex. Paul and Eve clear the air for a renewed courtship. Terri revels in her new-found freedom with Jack.

episodes.name: Episode 231
episodes.overview: Vince has a hidden agenda in wanting to attend a martial arts class. Eve's attitudes to Cheree puzzles Lucy.

episodes.name: Episode 232
episodes.overview: Reuben suffers a crisis of conscience. Eve takes a huge step forward in relating to Terri as an adult.

episodes.name: Episode 233
episodes.overview: Reuben has to decide between loyalty to Steve and to his old mate. Boris loses his cool at the thought of being reviewed for Top Tucker.

episodes.name: Episode 234
episodes.overview: Steve finds it hard to forgive Reuben for getting into trouble over the escaped teenagers. Jack suspects there is more to his sacking than meets the eye. Boris and Fiona nearly ruin the Top Tucker review.

episodes.name: Episode 235
episodes.overview: Monique hits Alex with a stunning revelation. Paul does his best to help Terri and Jack. Lucy recieves a surprise when she meets Geoff's work partner, Chris.

episodes.name: Episode 236
episodes.overview: Alex is concerned that Monique's options for the baby might not include him. Kate and Dave have a romantic night...sweeping the floors. Vince is confused by drunk Bruno's comments.

episodes.name: Episode 237
episodes.overview: Alex feels the pressure of keeping Monique's secret. Vince and Bruno share an intimate moment. Lucy grows suspicious of Geoff's colleague Chris.

episodes.name: Episode 238
episodes.overview: Maggie fumes as Lucy makes a power play at the newspaper. Reuben tells Steve he has had enough of being criticised and he is looking for work elsewhere.

episodes.name: Episode 239
episodes.overview: When Danny gets an interview for a job, Eve insists he wears a suit. Steve tries to get to the root of Titch's problems. Lucy has gone power mad and Maggie is suffering.

episodes.name: Episode 240
episodes.overview: Jack and Terri take a momentous step forward in their relationship. Danny's first day in his new job is full of surprises. Lucy's paranoia causes the end of her relationship with Geoff.

episodes.name: Episode 241
episodes.overview: Boris helps Alex come to terms with Lara's death and his recurring nightmare. Kate helps Monica accept her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Episode 242
episodes.overview: Terri and Jack return from their big night out. Alex and Monique start bonding over their baby.

episodes.name: Episode 243
episodes.overview: Eve's Uncle Ron proves to be a problem. Terri and Jack loosen up a little. Vince is threatened by the gang.

episodes.name: Episode 244
episodes.overview: Vince feels left out. Reuben battles Dave. Steve is deeply concerned for Titch's welfare.

episodes.name: Episode 245
episodes.overview: Geoff confronts Lucy about the prank calls. Danny confesses stealing money to Dave. Old feelings are brought to the fore when Eve sees Steve with Lily.

episodes.name: Episode 246
episodes.overview: Danny deals with the quilt about taking Jaime's money by roping Paul into his dilemma. Lucy creates havoc in Geoff's life, but her scheme back fires when she attacks his car with a screwdriver.

episodes.name: Episode 247
episodes.overview: Lucy's plans backfire. In the process she loses Geoff and her job at GoGirl. Cheree's return home proves a disaster and Eve is blamed. Maggie resigns from Eve's newspaper.

episodes.name: Episode 248
episodes.overview: Vince is stalked by Joey and his gang. Eve tries to entice Maggie to stay at the paper. Terri's jealously laeds to a new understanding.

episodes.name: Episode 249
episodes.overview: Reuben's attitude to Steve and Dave puts him in danger of being charged with assult. Lily has a plan to spend more time with Steve.

episodes.name: Episode 250
episodes.overview: Reuben's situation goes from bad to worse. Kate disagrees with Dave over Reuben. Steve is impressed with Lily and her intellect.

episodes.name: Episode 251
episodes.overview: Vince gives Bruno the ultimatum. Danny has an enjoyable and productive day with Lucy. Reuben lousy day gets even worse.

episodes.name: Episode 252
episodes.overview: Danny is kissed by Lucy. Steve's interest in Lucy steps up. Vince loses a friend forever.

episodes.name: Episode 253
episodes.overview: Monique's little sister Xanthe arrives. Fiona attempts to cheer Vince up. Reuben plots to bring Dave down.

episodes.name: Episode 254
episodes.overview: Tension between Monique and Xanthe builds. Maggie is devastated by Eve's insensitivity. Boris and Jack are stunned by contents of their father will.

episodes.name: Episode 255
episodes.overview: Terri is responsible for Jack and Boris falling out over their inheritance. Maggie and Eve have difficulty making their farewells on Maggie's final day.

episodes.name: Episode 256
episodes.overview: Money proves to be the root of all conflict when Boris and Terri reveal competing dreams for Jack's inheritance. Steve and Lily get together. Fiona loses her fight to keep her epilepsey a secret.

episodes.name: Episode 257
episodes.overview: When Kate discovers Fiona is epileptic, Fiona wants her to keep it a secret, but Kate is unsure what to do. Phil is furious when he discovers Lily and Steve are intimate.

episodes.name: Episode 258
episodes.overview: Steve lets his head rule his heart over Lily. Lucy is keen to impress Eve so she double-crosses Xanthe. Paul's plans for a romantic break with Eve fails.

episodes.name: Episode 259
episodes.overview: Lucy and Xanthe have word over Lucy stealing the article. Monique is annoyed at Xanthe, so Alex tells her it's time to speak up or shut up. Dave is having bad run on the horses.

episodes.name: Episode 260
episodes.overview: Paul asks Eve if he can move back into the apartment. Dave attempts to borrow money from Kate.

episodes.name: Episode 261
episodes.overview: The Simmons family finally makes a decision about Paul moving back in. Xanthe learns Monique and Alex have been lying. Karen accepts the news of Monique's pregnacy with mixed feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 262
episodes.overview: Boris tries to stop Jack from wasting his inheritance. Reuben is smitten by a new street kid on the block. Dave blows all the money Kate lent him at the races.

episodes.name: Episode 263
episodes.overview: Jack and Terri finally get their day in the recording studio. Dave's gambling is out of control. Lily and Steve's relationship hits the rocks.

episodes.name: Episode 264
episodes.overview: Steve has been forced to do something drastic about Titch's situation. Monique returns from visiting her mother to find an unwanted cat in her home.

episodes.name: Episode 265
episodes.overview: Monique and Xanthe prepare for their mother's visit. Vince tries to figure out how to deal with Fiona's epilepsy. Cheree challenges Eve to 'come out' and write part of the book with her.

episodes.name: Episode 266
episodes.overview: Monique is suspicious when her mother suddenly arrives in town. Reuben tries to make his peace with Kate, but only makes things worse.

episodes.name: Episode 267
episodes.overview: Steve is at the centre of a hostage situation. Dave realises it's time to tell Kate the truth.

episodes.name: Episode 268
episodes.overview: Eve annouces that Terri is getting a tutor (Kelly). Uninvited guest taint Danny's 16th birthday party.

episodes.name: Episode 269
episodes.overview: Danny learns of Tanya's reputation.

episodes.name: Episode 270
episodes.overview: Lucy loses her temper with Eve.

episodes.name: Episode 271
episodes.overview: Alex helps Monique unpack some of the emotional baggage she's been carrying with her mother and sister.

episodes.name: Episode 272
episodes.overview: Jack finds himself in a compromising situation with an attractive Bondi FM DJ.

episodes.name: Episode 273
episodes.overview: Kelly brings an element of fun to Terri's study. Danny goes on his first date with Tanya.

episodes.name: Episode 274
episodes.overview: Jack admits kissing Andie and Terri is furious.

episodes.name: Episode 275
episodes.overview: Kate gets her hopes up when Dave suggests they remain good friends.

episodes.name: Episode 276
episodes.overview: Paul decides to run with Danny in the marathon. Xanthe feels pressed to do well in the marathon. Reuben blames himself when he finds out Delia has been buying drugs.

episodes.name: Episode 277
episodes.overview: Danny and Tanya get into trouble. Xanthe is advised to take a modelling course. Fiona pays Boris back for helping through the City to Surf competition.

episodes.name: Episode 278
episodes.overview: Danny faces the wrath of Chubby (Tanya's father). Kelly (Terri's tutor) becomes embroiled in her student's love life. Monique begins to think about quitting BMS.

episodes.name: Episode 279
episodes.overview: Jack calls off his relationship with Terri. Lucy presents Reuben with an ultimatum. Lucy and Kelly cement their friendship.

episodes.name: Episode 280
episodes.overview: Reuben is driven to the edge. Kate tells Dave it's over. Cheree realises too late for the urgency of Reuben's cry for help.

episodes.name: Episode 281
episodes.overview: Reuben begins the journey back from the brink. Danny defies parental sanctions to keep his rendezvous with Tanya. Cheree is dreading the thought of visiting Reuben.

episodes.name: Episode 282
episodes.overview: Reuben makes peace with Steve and Cheree. Lucy and Kelly's relationship takes a leap into something more than friendship.

episodes.name: Episode 283
episodes.overview: Lucy is in turmoil. Tanya and Danny sneak a date but Terri catches them. Fiona continues to tease Boris about Xanthe.

episodes.name: Episode 284
episodes.overview: Monique decides not to go out on her own. Xanthe's illness brings her closer to Karen.

episodes.name: Episode 285
episodes.overview: Reuben is free at last. Alex is feeling the burden of responsibility for the new baby.

episodes.name: Episode 286
episodes.overview: Reuben is freed at last. Eve is unsure about being a surrogate mother.

episodes.name: Episode 287
episodes.overview: Lucy fights her feelings for Kelly. Boris extends an olive branch to Xanthe.

episodes.name: Episode 288
episodes.overview: Jack refuses to let Terri push him around. Vince, Danny and Tanya find themselves stranded.

episodes.name: Episode 289
episodes.overview: Xanthe has reason to celebrate. Eve and Kelly have a doozy of a barney. Vince resorts to desperate measures to retrieve his keys.

episodes.name: Episode 290
episodes.overview: Lucy and Kelly attempt to form a platonic friendship. Xanthe test positive for drugs.

episodes.name: Episode 291
episodes.overview: Lucy spends the night with Kelly. Terri asks for Paul's help to re-instate Kelly. Monique goes to a clairvoyant.

episodes.name: Episode 292
episodes.overview: Danny persuades Terri to help him finish with Tanya.

episodes.name: Episode 293
episodes.overview: Lucy has problems. Danny lacks moral courage. Fiona discovers that she's to blame for Xanthe's problems.

episodes.name: Episode 294
episodes.overview: Fiona tells Xanthe she is the one who drugged her drink. Steve attempts to reach out to Luke.

episodes.name: Episode 295
episodes.overview: Repercussions of Luke hitting Steve are felt throughout Breakers.

episodes.name: Episode 296
episodes.overview: Cheree ingores Reuben when he needs her most. Cathey and Kate have a confrontation.

episodes.name: Episode 297
episodes.overview: When a joke hostage situation backfires, Cheree ends up worse off than ever. And Danny and Vince are locked in the bathroom with only their boxers on during the hostage.

episodes.name: Episode 298
episodes.overview: Eve is unimpressed with Luke's hostage stunt. Xanthe pre-empts the drug hearing. Jack's big night out isn't all he expects.

episodes.name: Episode 299
episodes.overview: Alex decides he would like to marry Monique. Xanthe is upset about losing her advertising endorsement.

episodes.name: Episode 300
episodes.overview: Boris tries to get Reuben to deal with his attempted suicide. Fiona's dreams come true when she corographs a fashion parade. And Alex proposes to Monique on the catwalk.

episodes.name: Episode 301
episodes.overview: Alex and Monique's decision to marry leads to all kinds of problems. Fiona's social conscience is pricked. Kate realises that Dave is still emotionally attached to his family and his ex-wife Mary. Paul agonizes over the outcome of an investigation by the Tax Department and eventually has to confess to Kate.

episodes.name: Episode 302
episodes.overview: Cheree is powerless to stop the tide of depression that swamps Luke and she is there for him in a way she never imagined. Reuben's beginning to think he's over counselling but Steve has other ideas. Alex and Monique get honest about getting married. Kate's had enough of the Dave and Mary situation, so she sorts it out once and for all.

episodes.name: Episode 303
episodes.overview: Monique and Alex's wedding plans go awry. Jack is shocked to by the cause of Terri's bad mood. Luke uses emotional blackmail on Cheree.

episodes.name: Episode 304
episodes.overview: Terri and Jack stress about the possibility of Terri being pregnant. Lucy is attracted to Kelly's brother. Boris tells Xanthe he is not interested in a relationshipand is surprised by her reaction.

episodes.name: Episode 305
episodes.overview: Fiona becomes more deeply entangled with Sean's politics. Lucy catches Eve discriminating against her, and is thrown into new temptation with Andrew through Kelly's innocence. Boris and Xanthe enjoy their secret liaison.

episodes.name: Episode 306
episodes.overview: Terri's pregnancy threatens to destory her relationship with Jack.

episodes.name: Episode 307
episodes.overview: Terri finds out she is not pregnant. Lucy has time alone with Andrew. Cheree seeks advice.

episodes.name: Episode 308
episodes.overview: Cheree is convinced she will never see the boy she loves again. Kate begins to feel marginalised over wedding plans.

episodes.name: Episode 309
episodes.overview: Monique tries to please everyone with the wedding arrangements. Lucy's gulit over her attraction to Andrew comes to a head.

episodes.name: Episode 310
episodes.overview: Vince feels his job prospects are improving. Kate and Monique resolve their differences. Fiona doubts her friendship with Boris.

episodes.name: Episode 311
episodes.overview: Xanthe is suspended for three months. Cheree finds the going tough.

episodes.name: Episode 312
episodes.overview: Eve receives some ego-shattering news. Vince has been suffering from a misconception about Eve. Kelly and Lucy get together.

episodes.name: Episode 313
episodes.overview: Lucy's romance with Kelly hits the rocks. Jack causes havoc at Breakers. Terri stress out.

episodes.name: Episode 314
episodes.overview: Lucy faces a new world without Kelly. Xanthe abandons her strict training routine.

episodes.name: Episode 315
episodes.overview: Alex and Monique have a disagreement over their honeymoon. Paul insists Danny pay board. Xanthe irks Boris.

episodes.name: Episode 316
episodes.overview: Xanthe suspects all is not well in her relationship with Boris. Reuben and Brooke become closer.

episodes.name: Episode 317
episodes.overview: Jack and Terri disagree over the ring she has brought him. Danny finally comes up with a scheme to make money to pay board.

episodes.name: Episode 318
episodes.overview: Xanthe is accused of vandalism. Jack finds himself in a compromising situation.

episodes.name: Episode 319
episodes.overview: Alex's father arrives with a surprise. Xanthe feels her life is crumbling away. Cheree is outraged.

episodes.name: Episode 320
episodes.overview: Alex learns Jane hasn't changed her ways.

episodes.name: Episode 321
episodes.overview: Alex avoids telling his father the truth about Jane. Boris almost doesn't make the wedding when distracted by Xanthe's underwear.

episodes.name: Episode 322
episodes.overview: Xanthe's enjoyment of the wedding is ruined by Boris's need for her not to cramp his style. Tim realises he is better off without Jane. Kate has to be hospitalised.

episodes.name: Episode 323
episodes.overview: Jack feels responsible for Kate's condition, while Tim and Steve's clash over her affections.

episodes.name: Episode 324
episodes.overview: Steve tries to help a pregnant schoolgirl. Xanthe has trouble with Boris. Simon woos Lucy.

episodes.name: Episode 325
episodes.overview: Boris admits that there will never be any real intmacy between Lucy and him. Brooke and Reuben acknowledge their attraction.

episodes.name: Episode 326
episodes.overview: Reuben and Brooke's relationship becomes more intimate. Vince thinks seriously about his career. Xanthe begins to put her problems into prespective.

episodes.name: Episode 327
episodes.overview: Steve, Eve and Paul lay ghost to rest. Reuben discovers a new maturity and confidence though his relationship with Brooke.

episodes.name: Episode 328
episodes.overview: Belinda confronts the truth about pregnancy. Cheree agrees to pose nude for Simon.

episodes.name: Episode 329
episodes.overview: Belinda discovers she is more pregnant than she thought. Xanthe tells Boris their relationship is over due to Boris inability to   share emotions.

episodes.name: Episode 330
episodes.overview: Kate regains consciousness. Eve forces Danny to reject Tim's offer.

episodes.name: Episode 331
episodes.overview: Terri realises what an awesome responsibility she is shouldering in supporting Belinda. Kate and Tim examine their future together. Steve and Paul are adamant their film will work.

episodes.name: Episode 332
episodes.overview: Kate and Tim rekindle their old romance. Lucy can't strip.

episodes.name: Episode 333
episodes.overview: Simon leaves Lucy. Kate has to make a huge decision. Steve's search for a new flatmate is harder than he thought.

episodes.name: Episode 334
episodes.overview: Lucy tries to find herself. Alex (Dan Hany now plays the part of Alex) applies for a Job. Steve's gorgeous new girlfriend is not quite what he expected.

episodes.name: Episode 335
episodes.overview: Monique can't keep her concerns regarding Alex's job to herself.    George looks for Belinda. Jack finds himself in hot water.

episodes.name: Episode 336
episodes.overview: Alex helps Kate make a momentous decision. The birth of Belinda's baby has an effect on Lucy. Cheree refuses to conform to Eve's standards.

episodes.name: Episode 337
episodes.overview: Lucy starts to come to terms with why Belinda's decision has affected her. Eve has trouble adjusting to Kate's decision.

episodes.name: Episode 338
episodes.overview: Kate is faced with the reality of her new life and doesn't like it. Alex comes clean with Monique. Steve and Leeza part.

episodes.name: Episode 339
episodes.overview: Terri is annoyed with Jack. Vince and Fiona decide to make a documentary on street kids.

episodes.name: Episode 340
episodes.overview: in a bid to keep Terri on side, Doug encourages Jack to invite her to a family barbecue. The kids film continues in its comedy of errors.

episodes.name: Episode 341
episodes.overview: Vince sees a new side of life with Peter. Steve is suspicious of his new flatmate's changing moods. Kate arrives back at Bondi.

episodes.name: Episode 342
episodes.overview: Boris suspects Vince of taking drugs. Peter is a less perfect flatmate.

episodes.name: Episode 343
episodes.overview: Belinda's decision to have her baby adopted out is taken badly by Lucy. Jack lies to Terri. Rueben and Fiona come up with a scheme for their film.

episodes.name: Episode 344
episodes.overview: Fiona accuses Boris of being heavy handed with Vince. Belinda rethinks her decision.

episodes.name: Episode 345
episodes.overview: Vince realises all that glitters is not gold. Xanthe confronts Fiona and Boris. Danny and Paul are at loggerheads.

episodes.name: Episode 346
episodes.overview: Jack accidentially reveals Doug's secret to Terri. Reuben thinks he has exploited the memory of Delia.

episodes.name: Episode 347
episodes.overview: Terri can't mind his own business. Rueben has sole responsibility for editing the film. Boris and Fiona confront their feelings.

episodes.name: Episode 348
episodes.overview: Doug and Sharon's martial troubles push Jack and Terri's relationship to the point of collapse.

episodes.name: Episode 349
episodes.overview: Cheree is shocked by the identity of her new publicist. Xanthe feels left out.

episodes.name: Episode 350
episodes.overview: Danny's argument with Paul gets out of hand. Xanthe tries to find out more about Mr Purcell. Cheree gives Benjamin a lesson.

episodes.name: Episode 351
episodes.overview: Danny and Paul deal with effects of his punch. Xanthe locates MrPurcell's great niece. Terri is coming to terms with her break-up with Jack.

episodes.name: Episode 352
episodes.overview: Terri is devastated by Jack's continued rejection. Xanthe meets a relative of the late Mr Purcell.

episodes.overview: As dance party fever hits Bondi, Andie comes back into Jack's life. Terri shocks everyone with a new look.

episodes.name: Episode 354
episodes.overview: Terri's new look and the events at the dance party are the hot topic of gossip at the Breakers.

episodes.name: Episode 355
episodes.overview: N/A

episodes.overview: Shock of Monique's fall causes her to go into early labour.

episodes.overview: Paul and Danny's loan dispute is resolved. Monique and Alex struggle financially.

episodes.name: Episode 358
episodes.overview: Alex and Monique struggle to come to terms with their premature baby's future. Danny is infatuated with Xanthe's new training partner.

episodes.name: Episode 359
episodes.overview: Disaster strikes when Fiona lures Boris out on a picnic. Benjamin and Cheree's relationship moves from professional to personal. Kate confronts Eve.

episodes.name: Episode 360
episodes.overview: Cheree and Benjamin are to appear on television. Lucy sells her story.

episodes.name: Episode 361
episodes.overview: Fiona has had enough of Boris's attitude. Paul confronts Eve about her strange behaviour. Baby Flynn scares his parents.

episodes.name: Episode 362
episodes.overview: Eve tells Paul what's troubling her.

episodes.name: Episode 363
episodes.overview: Benjamin worries about Cheree's HIV status. Alex decides on another high profile photo gig. Terri starts a new relationship.

episodes.name: Episode 364
episodes.overview: Paul is unhappy to find Terri has been lying. Danny scares Sam off.

episodes.name: Episode 365
episodes.overview: Jack's scavenger hunt is a smashing success. Andie feels threated when Jack takes control.

episodes.name: Episode 366
episodes.overview: Alex is left alone to look after baby Flynn. Eve suspects Paul of having an affair with Irene.

episodes.name: Episode 367
episodes.overview: Rueben organises a party for Cheree. Alex decides the paparazzi career isn't for him.

episodes.name: Episode 368
episodes.overview: Terri gets physical when Dean's mates cause havoc at Cheree's party.

episodes.name: Episode 369
episodes.overview: Vince makes a choice about his future. Paul feels threatened by Terri's new flame.

episodes.name: Episode 370
episodes.overview: Jack ends his relationship with Andie. Danny reveals the truth about his past relationships to Sam.

episodes.name: Episode 371
episodes.overview: Danny and sam take tentative steps towards a new relationship. Cheree asks Reuben to move out so that she and Benjamin can be alone.

episodes.name: Episode 372
episodes.overview: Reuben decides to move on. Alex feels distanced from his family.

episodes.name: Episode 373
episodes.overview: Vince believes his future lies in Sydney. Eve can't handle the stress the new magazine puts on her.

episodes.name: Episode 374
episodes.overview: Terri has exam nerves. Xanthe reassesses her athletic career. Eve cracks.

episodes.name: Episode 375
episodes.overview: Dean is shocked to discover what he and his mates have inadvertently caused. Danny urges Sam to take the scholarship.

episodes.name: Episode 376
episodes.overview: Reuben finds what he's been looking for. Irene threatens to sack Eve. Terri searches for Steve.

episodes.name: Episode 377
episodes.overview: Reuben's mother delivers some home truths. Dean is in danger. Vince must make a choice.

episodes.name: Episode 378
episodes.overview: Benjamin rejects Cheree. Boris tries to bridge a growing gap between himself and Fiona. The gang goes to the Mardi Gras.

episodes.name: Episode 379
episodes.overview: Things look up for Alex and Monique. Cheree orders Benjamin out of her life. Eve reaches breaking point.

episodes.name: Episode 380
episodes.overview: Paul warns Eve of the ramifications of her actions. The gang asks Dean to burgle Terri's apartment.

episodes.name: Episode 381
episodes.overview: Eve interrupts an intruder. Fiona finds out the real reason why she couldn't take the apartment.

episodes.name: Episode 382
episodes.overview: Reuben tells Cheree he needs to move on and be his own man. Fiona's relationship with Boris is set for difficulties. Eve is unwillingly faced with an intruder.

episodes.name: Episode 383
episodes.overview: Monique and Alex stress over money problems. A mystery woman comes to visit Steve much to Kate's curiosity. Vince remains disgruntled about his parents decision to move to Bathurst.

episodes.name: Episode 384
episodes.overview: Kate attempts to act casual when her date with Steve does not eventuate. Vince is allowed to stay in Sydney. Jack is busted when he takes a sickie.

episodes.name: Episode 385
episodes.overview: Monique can't help feeling threatened by Xanthe's growing involvement in BMS. Jack blames Cheree and Danny when he loses his job at the surf club.

episodes.name: Episode 386
episodes.overview: Everyone struggles to deal with Eve's disapearance. Jack fights for his job.

episodes.name: Episode 387
episodes.overview: Monique manipulates her way back into BMS. Everyone wonders where Eve is.

episodes.name: Episode 388
episodes.overview: Rebecca reveals Steve has a Son. Fiona moves without Boris's help.

episodes.name: Episode 389
episodes.overview: Dean leaves a terrified Terri with the gang. Steve gets to know his son.

episodes.name: Episode 390
episodes.overview: Xanthe interviews Dr Dalton. Paul suffers over Eve and Terri's departure. Dean betrays a friend.

episodes.name: Episode 391
episodes.overview: Terri has a miserable 18th birthday with her mother away. Danny fears his family is falling apart. Reuben is concerned that Cheree is spending all of her book advance.

episodes.name: Episode 392
episodes.overview: Xanthe is warned off Dr Nick Dalton. Vince gets cold feet about the underwear shoot. Paul feels the strain of Eve's disappearance.

episodes.name: Episode 393
episodes.overview: Dr Nick turns on the charm. Jack tells Brett that Lucy is into girls. Vince's worst nightmare comes true.

episodes.name: Episode 394
episodes.overview: Steve is finding it hard to shake his doubts at being Cameron's father. Jack bribes Brett into taking Lucy out on a date.

episodes.name: Episode 395
episodes.overview: Rebecca reveals what went on between her and Steve several years before.

episodes.name: Episode 396
episodes.overview: Rebeeca won't accept Steve's word that he believes her and wants a DNA test. Boris and Fiona disagree on children. Monique's fussiness annoys Alex.

episodes.name: Episode 397
episodes.overview: Terri discovers Eve checked out of the retreat 5 days ago. Xanthe doesn't trust Alex's solution to their babysitting problem.

episodes.name: Episode 398
episodes.overview: Eve returns to Bondi with some bad news for Paul. Xanthe confesses that she doesn't trust India. Nick and Xanthe share a kiss, while on top of the city.

episodes.name: Episode 399
episodes.overview: Eve and Paul relationship is in turmoil. Vince pumps iron. Lucy rekindles her interest in Brett.

episodes.name: Episode 400
episodes.overview: Paul talks about Eve's plans. Vince obsesses over his body.

episodes.name: Episode 401
episodes.overview: Terri receives her HSC results. Steve and Rebecca must make a decision about Cameron. Monique meets India.

episodes.name: Episode 402
episodes.overview: Xanthe is busy at BMS. Jack is honest with Lucy about Brett's intentions. A heartbroken Terri tells Paul about her HSC results.

episodes.name: Episode 403
episodes.overview: Xanthe wants Nick to tell her how he feels. Jack is upset when he doesn't get the lifeguard job.

episodes.name: Episode 404
episodes.overview: Eve chooses her family over her lover. Lucy does her best to keep the office together without Eve.

episodes.name: Episode 405
episodes.overview: Paul doesn't want to know what's plaguing Eve's conscience. Cheree has an idea for her book.

episodes.name: Episode 406
episodes.overview: Steve wonders if Cameron really wants to spend time with him. Kate tells Eve to concentrate on her future with Paul.

episodes.name: Episode 407
episodes.overview: Cameron is happy to stay in Bondi, but it has nothing to do with Steve. Cheree is being stalked.

episodes.name: Episode 408
episodes.overview: Cheree is concerned she is being stalked. Jack gives Fiona a little advice about Boris.

episodes.name: Episode 409
episodes.overview: Xanthe acts as Monique's fairy godmother. Terri is shocked to learn of Eve's affair.

episodes.name: Episode 410
episodes.overview: Xanthe and Nick hit a bump in their relationship. Danny faces a dilemma.

episodes.name: Episode 411
episodes.overview: Paul is dreading the arrival of his father. Alex and Monique receive a nasty surprise. Nick and Xanthe search for direction.

episodes.name: Episode 412
episodes.overview: Terri suffers after her night out on the town. India tries to impress Alex.

episodes.name: Episode 413
episodes.overview: Cheree realises the stalker is real. Steve begins to bond with his son. Paul regrets his mistakes with the models and is determined to get BMS back on track.

episodes.name: Episode 414
episodes.overview: Steve makes steady progress with Cameron. Reuben's trip takes a sinister turn.

episodes.name: Episode 415
episodes.overview: Fiona can't help but idolise Nick. Fiona and Boris argue with shocking consequences.

episodes.name: Episode 416
episodes.overview: Believing that Nick is asleep, Xanthe tells him she loves him. Fiona recovers from her seizure. Terri continues to be the party girl.

episodes.name: Episode 417
episodes.overview: Fiona has another seizure. Jack's job at the car wash is anything but rewarding. Nick lies to Xanthe about his work commitments.

episodes.name: Episode 418
episodes.overview: Paul is convinced they should use BMS models to help launch the new car wash. Lucy has some startling news for Steve.

episodes.name: Episode 419
episodes.overview: Paul's attempt to rekindle the spark with Eve is a success. Cameron and Steve find common ground when it comes to protecting Cheree.

episodes.name: Episode 420
episodes.overview: Cameron and Cheree think they have seen the stalker. Lyall berates Paul over his career choice.

episodes.name: Episode 421
episodes.overview: Steve finds his son and takes him to hospital where he discovers Cheree and Cam are romantically involved. Nick and Xanthe are star-crossed lovers. Danny feels guilty for cheating on Sam.

episodes.name: Episode 422
episodes.overview: Steve comes to terms with Cameron and Cheree's relationship. Underlying trouble between Paul and Lyall come to head Stuart's art impresses Eve.

episodes.name: Episode 423
episodes.overview: Fiona and Boris's problems continue. Reuben finds a baby Kangaroo. Stuart's art becomes a talking point.

episodes.name: Episode 424
episodes.overview: Fiona realises she can't expect Boris to change for her. Boris tells Reuben the kangaroo must go.

episodes.name: Episode 425
episodes.overview: Jack suspects Slim is running the stolen car racket. Rueben takes the joey to a mysterious woman. Boris feels his relationship with Fiona is going nowhere.

episodes.name: Episode 426
episodes.overview: Jack is in trouble with the law. Rueben becomes more and more intrigued with Autumn. Cheree endangers her relationship with Eve. Kelly calls Lucy.

episodes.name: Episode 427
episodes.overview: Reuben stays home with Autumn. Jack enlists Boris's help in sorting out his legal troubles.

episodes.name: Episode 428
episodes.overview: Fiona and Boris break up. Sam has a malignant melanoma. Nick tells Xanthe about his travel dreams. Alex and India kiss.

episodes.name: Episode 429
episodes.overview: Alex thinks Monique has left him. Cheree tells Cameron they can't have a relationship. Paul supports Danny after Sam dies.

episodes.name: Episode 430
episodes.overview: Lucy considers a career change, after talking to a movie producer. Steve decides to leave ATT and take Cameron with him to the Gold Coast. Terri helps Danny comes to terms with Sam's death. The Simmons family walk off in to the sunset. And Cheree's stalker is right under her nose, as he is revealed in the last scene of the series.
